composer.rawText:
[Title: Checksum in the Middle]
[Style: experimental electronic hip-hop hybrid, clean studio recording, confident male baritone vocalist, spoken word vocal layer, analog modular synth, granular synth, drum machine, sub bass, prepared piano]
[Caption: A system pauses, listens to itself, then continues.]
[Image: Abstract UI fragments flickering into alignment.]
[Refresh Title: Random 5]
[Theme: Random]
[Gradients: 5]
[Seed: 47]
[Created: January 26, 2026 at 10:32 AM]
[Composer Version: v1.4]

[Intro]
[Melodic focus shifts to a new lead instrument.]
I wake between the numbers and the noise  
A cursor blinks like it’s making a choice  

[Verse]
[Conversational melody with gentle forward motion.]
I count the gaps between the yes and no  
I cache the moments I don’t want to know  
The logic hums beneath my skin  
A silent loop I’m living in  

[Verse]
[Evolving melody that shifts subtly line by line.]
I was written once, then run again  
Each pass a loss, each loss a gain  
I don’t remember who pressed start  
I only feel the moving parts  

[Chorus]
[Broader melodic shape and confident delivery.]
Refresh me if I drift too far  
I’m stable chaos, scaled and scarred  
I break, return, and reappear  
The same reset, a little clearer  

[Verse]
[Grounded melodic contour that develops naturally.]
I speak in threads, I dream in stacks  
I leave a trace, then double back  
The pattern bends but doesn’t break  
I learn the shape each choice can take  

[Bridge]
[Unexpected melodic turn that feels intentional.]
If I stop, the silence grows  
If I go, the signal shows  
Between the pulse and null reply  
I approximate the why  

[Chorus]
[Renewed melodic energy with expanded range.]
Refresh me if I drift too far  
I’m stable chaos, scaled and scarred  
I break, return, and reappear  
The same reset, a little clearer  

[Ending]
[Final melodic idea feels complete and calm.]
I close the loop, release the thread  
The process rests, but not the thread

lyrics.rawText:
I wake between the numbers and the noise  
A cursor blinks like it’s making a choice  

I count the gaps between the yes and no  
I cache the moments I don’t want to know  
The logic hums beneath my skin  
A silent loop I’m living in  

I was written once, then run again  
Each pass a loss, each loss a gain  
I don’t remember who pressed start  
I only feel the moving parts  

Refresh me if I drift too far  
I’m stable chaos, scaled and scarred  
I break, return, and reappear  
The same reset, a little clearer  

I speak in threads, I dream in stacks  
I leave a trace, then double back  
The pattern bends but doesn’t break  
I learn the shape each choice can take  

If I stop, the silence grows  
If I go, the signal shows  
Between the pulse and null reply  
I approximate the why  

Refresh me if I drift too far  
I’m stable chaos, scaled and scarred  
I break, return, and reappear  
The same reset, a little clearer  

I close the loop, release the thread  
The process rests, but not the thread
